== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libc/libchewing, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Even though there are input methods for Traditional Chinese such as gcin and xcin, it's better to have scim-chewing for scim which will be a default input method for CJK users. Scim-Chewing is depend on libchewing2, and libchewing2 depend on libchewing-data.
** See also MainInclusionReportscim
** See also MainInclusionReportScimChewing
** See also MainInclusionReportLibChewing2
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Well maintained as a sub project of scim-im.org and chewing.csie.net.
** No critial bugs found in ubuntu and debian.
** All as the same as scim-chewing. See also MainInclusionReportScimChewing
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** libc6
